column1: Uchi////This place will live up to the hype. Trust me. Two weeks after my 2nd visit and I am still thinking about the Brussels sprouts. I'm sure it's a simple science of fish oil and some frying
column2: but they are seriously the most addictive plate on the menu (we ordered 2). The waiters are really friendly and good at suggesting items. I don't even remember all of the dishes that we had but every single one was amazing. This place made me love sashimi
column3: and I never thought I'd say that.
